REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0562 reute r f BC-HYPONEX-<HYPX>-FILES 03-06 0060

TEXT.TITLE: HYPONEX <HYPX> FILES FOR DEBT OFFER
TEXT.BODY: Hyponex Corp said it filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of 100 mln dlrs of senior subordinated debentures due 1999, with an over-allotment option of 15 mln dlrs. Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc is sole manager of the offering, the lawn products company said. Reuter
